name: Wall Breaker (GbG Engine)
description:
Wall Breaker is a classic brick-breaking game that challenges players to use a paddle to bounce a ball against a wall of bricks, clearing them out of the way to advance to the next level. The game is fast-paced and requires quick reflexes and strategy to succeed.

The player controls a small paddle at the bottom of the screen, which they use to bounce a ball up towards a wall of bricks at the top of the screen. The goal is to break all the bricks without letting the ball fall off the bottom of the screen. To do this, the player must move the paddle left and right to keep the ball in play, and use power-ups to help clear the screen.

Alpha release

Fully fledged level editor, save, open and start new levels. You can add power ups to the bricks and test your level. Game progression mode will come in a later release

Editor

Select one of the three bricks on the right pane and then place them on the level. 

When you select one of the bricks on the level you can choose a power up to be dropped when the brick gets destroyed.
